text: wo aise hai jo tauba karne wale ibadath karne wale,hamd karne wale,roza rakhne wale(ya rahe haq mein safar karne wale)ruko aur sajda karne wale,nek batho ki talim dene wale aur bori batho se baaz rakhne wale aur Allah ki hadho ka qayal rakhne wale hai aur aise mominin ko aap khushqabri suna di jiye
